title: Halo_2_XboX_game_compatible_with_XboX_360_only_NTSC
description: This is USA version of Halo 2 original XboX game for the XboX 360. What I mean by that is that it only plays in the XboX 360. If you put this in your XboX console you will only see a movie. Burn it with ImgBurn in a Dual Layer disk and make sure to set the booktype to DVD-ROM. At the moment is XboX Live safe. However I&#039;m not sure about the future. Remember that at the moment you cannot use a Pal image in a NTSC console and viceversa. I hope you enjoy!!!
